FinScript

Enum CalculateMode

Namespace
FinScript.Code
Assembly
FinScript.Core.dll

Defines the methods of sending a recalculate notification to script object

public enum CalculateMode

Fields

OnBarOpen = 0

The fastest mode: unit gets notification only on new bar open

OnEachTick = 1

The slowest mode: unit gets notification on every tick

OnPriceChange = 2

The "middle" mode: units gets notification on next tick if this tick changes current price
